trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of application-specific <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> instances used in combination with <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta di specifiche dell'applicazione <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> istanze utilizzate in combinazione con <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The PackageStore defines a reference collections of package that are open and active in the application.
trans-unit.target: Il PackageStore definisce un insiemi di riferimento del pacchetto aperto e attivo nell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: Packages added to the PackageStore are accessed is by their key URI value.
trans-unit.target: Aggiungere il PackageStore i pacchetti sono accessibili è il loro valore URI chiave.

trans-unit.source: The PackageStore supports three common uses: 1.
trans-unit.target: La PackageStore supporta tre usi comuni: 1.

trans-unit.source: Accessing <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> data through <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: L'accesso ai <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>dati tramite <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: The application obtaining an instance of a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> given the package's URI.
trans-unit.target: L'applicazione ottiene un'istanza di un <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>base URI del pacchetto.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: Accessing packages that are created and stored in a <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>.
trans-unit.target: Accesso ai pacchetti che vengono creati e archiviati in un <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>.</xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>

trans-unit.source: To improve performance and minimize the overhead of repeated file open/close operations, the PackageStore is used to manage instances of packages accessed by <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> and directly by the application.
trans-unit.target: Per migliorare le prestazioni e ridurre al minimo il sovraccarico di operazioni di apertura o chiusura di file ripetute, il PackageStore viene utilizzato per gestire le istanze dei pacchetti a cui accede <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>e direttamente dall'applicazione.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: When accessing data in a package, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> address of a requested <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> is first checked to see if the package is already defined and open in the PackageStore.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'accesso ai dati in un pacchetto, la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>indirizzo di un oggetto richiesto <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A>viene dapprima controllata per verificare se il pacchetto è già definito e aperto nel PackageStore.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: If the package is defined as open in the PackageStore, requested parts can be accessed directly without repeatedly opening and closing the package for each request.
trans-unit.target: Se il pacchetto è definito come aperto nel PackageStore, parti richieste è possibile accedere direttamente senza più volte di apertura e chiusura del pacchetto per ogni richiesta.

trans-unit.source: If your application opens a package with <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> can be called to add the package to the PackageStore.
trans-unit.target: Se l'applicazione apre un pacchetto con <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A>può essere chiamato per aggiungere il pacchetto di PackageStore.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A> should later be called to remove the package from the PackageStore prior to calling <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A>deve essere chiamato in un secondo momento per rimuovere il pacchetto di PackageStore prima di chiamare <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A>

trans-unit.source: XPS packages opened with an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructor are automatically added and removed from the PackageStore when the document is created and disposed.
trans-unit.target: Pacchetti XPS aperti con un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A>costruttore vengono automaticamente aggiunti e rimossi dal PackageStore quando il documento viene creato o eliminato.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: (You do not need to call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A> separately for XPS packages opened with <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructors.) The file I/O permissions of a package accessed through the PackageStore remains the same as the I/O permissions set on the package when it is opened.
trans-unit.target: (Non è necessario chiamare <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A>o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A>separatamente per i pacchetti XPS aperti con <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A>costruttori.)</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> Le autorizzazioni dei / o file di un pacchetto a cui si accede tramite il PackageStore rimane lo stesso come le autorizzazioni dei / o impostati nel pacchetto quando viene aperto.

trans-unit.source: The PackageStore only provides references to the packages that have been added the store.
trans-unit.target: Il PackageStore fornisce solo i riferimenti ai pacchetti che sono stati aggiunti nell'archivio.

trans-unit.source: It is up to the application to correctly open, update, and close each package.
trans-unit.target: È compito dell'applicazione per aprire, aggiornare e chiudere ciascun pacchetto correttamente.

trans-unit.source: Packages added to the PackageStore can be accessed in multithreaded environments when they are used in combination with a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] parser such as <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiungere il PackageStore pacchetti è possibile accedere in ambienti a thread multipli quando vengono utilizzati in combinazione con un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] parser, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When operating in a multithreaded environment, the application must lock the package before access.
trans-unit.target: Quando si opera in un ambiente con multithreading, l'applicazione deve bloccare il pacchetto prima dell'accesso.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> to the store.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> nell'archivio.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` defines the package's key URI that is compared when you call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri`definisce la chiave del pacchetto URI che viene confrontato quando si chiama <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: If the `packageUri` matches the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> for a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> in a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> call, the package defined in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> is used to access the requested part.
trans-unit.target: Se la `packageUri` corrispondente <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A>per una <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>in una <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>chiamata, il pacchetto definito in <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>viene utilizzata per accedere la parte richiesta.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the `packageUri` does not match the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> for a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> in a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> call, the package with the specified URI is opened to access the requested part.
trans-unit.target: Se il `packageUri` non corrisponde a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A>una <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>in una <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>chiamata, il pacchetto con l'URI specificato viene utilizzato per accedere la parte richiesta.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Security Note** This method demands <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> for all custom <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (non-<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) types.
trans-unit.target: **Nota sulla sicurezza** questo metodo richiede <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission>personalizzato tutti <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>(non -<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) tipi.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission>

trans-unit.source: The key [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the `package` to compare in a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La chiave [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del `package` da confrontare un <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The package to add to the store.
trans-unit.target: Il pacchetto da aggiungere all'archivio.

trans-unit.source: package is .
trans-unit.target: packageis .

trans-unit.source: packageUri is an invalid package [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: packageUriè un pacchetto non valido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A package with the specified packageUri is already in the store.
trans-unit.target: Un pacchetto con l'oggetto specificato packageUri è già presente nell'archivio.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> with a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] from the store.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> con un oggetto specificato [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] dall'archivio.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` is matched to the URIs specified in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri`viene confrontato con l'URI specificato nella <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A>chiamata al metodo.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Security Note** This method demands <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> for all custom <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (non-<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) types.
trans-unit.target: **Nota sulla sicurezza** questo metodo richiede <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission>personalizzato tutti <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>(non -<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) tipi.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the package to return.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del pacchetto da restituire.

trans-unit.source: The package with a specified packageUri; or , if a package with the specified packageUri is not in the store.
trans-unit.target: Il pacchetto con un oggetto specificato packageUri ; o , se un pacchetto con l'oggetto specificato packageUri non è presente nell'archivio.

trans-unit.source: packageUri is .
trans-unit.target: packageUriis .

trans-unit.source: packageUri is an invalid package [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: packageUriè un pacchetto non valido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> with a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] from the store.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> con un oggetto specificato [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] dall'archivio.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` is matched to the URIs specified in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri`viene confrontato con l'URI specificato nella <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A>chiamata al metodo.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Security Note** This method demands <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> for all custom <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (non-<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) types.
trans-unit.target: **Nota sulla sicurezza** questo metodo richiede <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission>personalizzato tutti <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>(non -<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) tipi.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the package to remove.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del pacchetto da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: packageUri is .
trans-unit.target: packageUriis .

trans-unit.source: packageUri is an invalid package [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: packageUriè un pacchetto non valido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
